LanguageData.AF_Storyteller_Lansy.label: <color=#87b4ff>L</color><color=#87beff>A</color><color=#87c8ff>N</color><color=#87d2ff>S</color><color=#87dcff>Y</color>
LanguageData.AF_Storyteller_Lansy.description:
Like most of the other ferians,Lansy believed that aliens were all smelly animals. Until he met a cute feathered friend who also despises aliens. 
(Although this alien partner is as Smelly as he thought aliens did .) 

After that encounter,The two monsters set off on a crazy journey in this rimworld!It's worth noting that they all tried to assimilate into the local aboriginal culture during the journey. 
(Although neither of them obeyed any rules.) 

【More random events, More faction communications, More dangerous missions. Lanxy, will describe a chaotic world with Hopes and Dreams!】
